A

Account - Class in socialmedia
This class contains all the methods and attributes of the Account and therefore is responsible for handling all the details related to a user on the Social Media Platform.
Account(String) - Constructor for class socialmedia.Account
This is the constructor method for an Account, it takes in the parameter handle which will be the username of the account.
Account(String, String) - Constructor for class socialmedia.Account
This is the constructor method for an Account, it takes in the parameters handle which will be the username of the account, and the description which will be connected to the account.
AccountIDNotRecognisedException - Exception in socialmedia
Thrown when attempting to use an account ID that does not exit in the system.
AccountIDNotRecognisedException() - Constructor for exception socialmedia.AccountIDNotRecognisedException
Constructs an instance of the exception with no message
AccountIDNotRecognisedException(String) - Constructor for exception socialmedia.AccountIDNotRecognisedException
Constructs an instance of the exception containing the message argument
addAccountToAllAccounts(Account) - Method in class socialmedia.SocialMedia
This method is used to add a instance of an account to the array of all accounts on the platform.
addComment(Comment) - Method in class socialmedia.Post
This methods adds a new comment to the post's list of comments it has recieved.
addEndorsement(Endorsement) - Method in class socialmedia.Post
This method adds a new endorsement to the post's list of endorsements it has recieved.
addNumEndorse() - Method in class socialmedia.Account
This method adds one to the number of endorsements the account has.
addNumPost() - Method in class socialmedia.Account
This method adds one to the number of posts, including endorsements and replies the account has.
addPostChildrenDetails(StringBuilder, Comment[], int) - Method in class socialmedia.SocialMedia
This is method which uses recurssion to display the posts and all the sub-posts.
addPostToAllPosts(Post) - Method in class socialmedia.SocialMedia
This method is used to add a instance of a post to the array of all posts on the platform.

B

BadSocialMedia - Class in socialmedia
BadSocialMedia is a minimally compiling, but non-functioning implementor of the SocialMediaPlatform interface.

Comment - Class in socialmedia
Comment
Comment(Account, String, Post) - Constructor for class socialmedia.Comment
This is the constructor method for a Comment, it takes in the parameters author which refers to the account associated with the post, message which must be up to 100 characters long and a Post which the comment is associated with.
commentPost(String, int, String) - Method in class socialmedia.BadSocialMedia
 
commentPost(String, int, String) - Method in interface socialmedia.MiniSocialMediaPlatform
The method creates a comment post referring to an existing post, similarly to a reply on Twitter.
commentPost(String, int, String) - Method in class socialmedia.SocialMedia
This method impliments the SocialMediaPlatform method commentPost by creating a comment post referring to an existing post, similarly to a reply on Twitter.

The method creates an account in the platform with the given handle.

This method allows the user to create an account with just their handle and it returns their id number afterwards.

createAccount(String, String) - Method in class socialmedia.SocialMedia
This method allows the user to create an account with the handle and description.
createAccount(String, String) - Method in interface socialmedia.SocialMediaPlatform

createPost(String, String) - Method in class socialmedia.BadSocialMedia

createPost(String, String) - Method in class socialmedia.SocialMedia

E

empty() - Method in class socialmedia.Post
This method emptys a post.
Endorsement - Class in socialmedia
This class consists of the specific methods and attributes of a Endorsement, some of the other methods and attributes of a Endorsement are inheritted from a Post.
Endorsement(Account, Post) - Constructor for class socialmedia.Endorsement
This is the constructor method for an Endorsement, it takes in the parameters author which refers to the account associated with the post and a Post which the endorsement is associated with.
endorsePost(String, int) - Method in class socialmedia.BadSocialMedia
 
endorsePost(String, int) - Method in interface socialmedia.MiniSocialMediaPlatform
The method creates an endorsement post of an existing post, similar to a retweet on Twitter.
endorsePost(String, int) - Method in class socialmedia.SocialMedia
This method impliments the SocialMediaPlatform method endorsePost by creating an endorsement post of an existing post, similar to a retweet on Twitter.
erasePlatform() - Method in class socialmedia.BadSocialMedia
 
erasePlatform() - Method in interface socialmedia.MiniSocialMediaPlatform
Method empties this SocialMediaPlatform of its contents and resets all internal counters.
erasePlatform() - Method in class socialmedia.SocialMedia
This method impliments the erasePlatform method in the MiniSocialMediaPlatform interface by emptying this SocialMediaPlatform of its contents and resets all internal counters in Account and Post.

This method returns the current total number of original posts (i.e., disregarding endorsements and comments) present in the platform.

I

IllegalHandleException - Exception in socialmedia
Thrown when attempting to assign an account handle already in use in the system.
IllegalHandleException() - Constructor for exception socialmedia.IllegalHandleException
Constructs an instance of the exception with no message
IllegalHandleException(String) - Constructor for exception socialmedia.IllegalHandleException
Constructs an instance of the exception containing the message argument
InvalidHandleException - Exception in socialmedia
Thrown when attempting to assign an account handle empty or having more than the system limit of characters.
InvalidHandleException() - Constructor for exception socialmedia.InvalidHandleException
Constructs an instance of the exception with no message
InvalidHandleException(String) - Constructor for exception socialmedia.InvalidHandleException
Constructs an instance of the exception containing the message argument
InvalidPostException - Exception in socialmedia
Thrown when attempting to create a post which the message is empty or has more characters than the system's limit.
InvalidPostException() - Constructor for exception socialmedia.InvalidPostException
Constructs an instance of the exception with no message
InvalidPostException(String) - Constructor for exception socialmedia.InvalidPostException
Constructs an instance of the exception containing the message argument

P

Post - Class in socialmedia
This class consists of the methods and attributes of a Post and therefore is responsible for all the details regarding a Post and due to how a Comment and Endorsement inherit from Post it is respinsible for some methods ad details of a a Comment and Endorsement.
Post(Account, String) - Constructor for class socialmedia.Post
This is the constructor method for a Post, it takes in the parameters author which refers to the account associated with the post and message which must be up to 100 characters long for a new post or comment.
Post(Account, Post) - Constructor for class socialmedia.Post
This is the constructor method for a Post, it takes in the parameters author which refers to the account associated with the post and linkedPost which is the post the new post is associated with when creating an endorsement post.
PostIDNotRecognisedException - Exception in socialmedia
Thrown when attempting to use a post ID that does not exit in the system.
PostIDNotRecognisedException() - Constructor for exception socialmedia.PostIDNotRecognisedException
Constructs an instance of the exception with no message
PostIDNotRecognisedException(String) - Constructor for exception socialmedia.PostIDNotRecognisedException
Constructs an instance of the exception containing the message argument
